- Atmosphere: Inspiring, dynamic, professional, and engaging

- Semi-realistic, high-quality illustration

Students doing an activity with the Tutero AI guy.

data.user_input: Students doing an activity with the Tutero AI guy.

data.prompt:
Create a vibrant, illustrated scene showing the Tutero AI robot character helping diverse students with Students doing an activity with the Tutero AI guy. in a modern classroom setting.

Aspect ratio 1500:1060 (1500x1060) landscape.

Tutero AI Character (CRITICAL):
- Friendly, rounded teal/turquoise robot (#4ECDC4) with expressive features
- Physically present in the scene, NOT on a tablet or screen
- Floating/hovering beside or among the students
- Glowing elements and helpful expression
- Large friendly eyes or screen face
- Actively helping or demonstrating to students

Students (2-4 students):
- Diverse group: varied ethnicities, genders, appearances
- Age: middle school (12-17 years)
- Expressions: Engaged, enthusiastic, focused, collaborative
- Clothing: Casual contemporary school attire, varied colors
- Body language: Leaning in, gesturing, pointing, actively participating
- Interaction: Discussing with each other AND with the Tutero AI robot

Setting & Environment:
- Modern classroom or collaborative learning space
- Contemporary desks/tables with students gathered around
- Learning materials: notebooks, textbooks, worksheets, whiteboards
- Background: Soft, muted (bookshelves, windows, educational posters - blurred)
- Clean, organized, welcoming space
- NO tablets or digital devices as primary focus

Learning Activity:
- Students working on Students doing an activity with the Tutero AI guy.
- Tutero AI robot actively assisting and teaching
- Visible materials related to the activity (worksheets, physical manipulatives, whiteboard)
- Mathematical content visible but not overwhelming
- Tools: calculators, rulers, protractors, markers, physical math tools
- Clear focus on collaborative problem-solving with AI assistance

Color Palette:
- Tutero AI: Teal/turquoise (#4ECDC4) with glowing accents
- Vibrant, energetic colors: bright blue (#3498DB), warm orange (#E67E22), fresh green (#27AE60)
- Diverse natural skin tones
- Varied colorful clothing
- Soft muted background (cream, light gray, soft blue)
- Pops of bright color in learning materials

Composition:
- Tutero AI robot prominent (20-30% of frame), physically in the scene
- Students in foreground (50-60% of frame)
- Clustered around shared workspace with AI robot among them
- Medium shot showing upper bodies and workspace
- Eye level slightly above, showing interaction clearly
- Dynamic but balanced layout

Lighting & Atmosphere:
- Bright, natural, welcoming lighting
- Soft shadows
- Warm, positive atmosphere
- Energetic but focused mood
- Professional educational quality

Style Guidelines:
- Illustrated/semi-realistic (not photographic, not cartoon)
- Vibrant and engaging
- Diverse and inclusive representation
- Active learning visible
- Collaborative and supportive atmosphere with AI assistance
- Modern and contemporary

CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS:
- Tutero AI robot MUST be physically present in the scene, NOT on a screen or tablet
- Must show 2-4 diverse students actively collaborating with the AI robot
- Students must be actively working together (not passive)
- Activity (Students doing an activity with the Tutero AI guy.) must be clearly integrated
- Atmosphere must be positive and engaging
- Professional educational quality
- Inclusive and representative
- AI robot is a physical character in the scene, helping students directly

Create a 3D rendered illustration showing the Tutero AI assistant helping a student learn about Water Skiing.

Aspect ratio 1500:1060 (1500x1060) landscape.

Characters:
- Tutero AI Robot: Friendly, rounded teal/turquoise robot character (#4ECDC4) with expressive features, glowing elements, floating/hovering beside student. Helpful and encouraging expression. Large friendly eyes or screen face, rounded non-threatening body shape.
- Student: middle school student, diverse representation, engaged and curious, looking at tablet/laptop screen, casual contemporary clothing.

Setting & Context:
- Educational environment related to Water Skiing
- Student using tablet or laptop
- AI robot positioned beside/near student, appearing helpful
- Clean, modern, uncluttered background
- Soft educational atmosphere

Technology Elements:
- Tablet/laptop with clean modern interface
- Soft glowing screen showing Water Skiing content
- Optional: Floating mathematical symbols or diagrams related to Water Skiing
- Optional: Holographic display elements
- Subtle tech particle effects

Color Palette:
- AI Robot: Teal/turquoise (#4ECDC4) with glowing accents
- Accents: Soft purple/lavender (#9B59B6), warm coral (#FF6B6B)
- Background: Light cream/off-white (#FFF9F5)
- Tech glow: Soft blue (#5DADE2)

Composition:
- AI robot on left or right (30-40% of frame)
- Student on opposite side, engaged with device
- Clear visual connection/interaction between AI and student
- Balanced, harmonious layout
- Shallow depth of field, focus on characters

Lighting & Mood:
- Soft, warm, inviting lighting
- Gentle shadows
- Subtle glow from AI and screens
- Encouraging, positive, supportive atmosphere
- Bright, daytime feel

Style Guidelines:
- 3D rendered, modern illustration style
- Friendly, approachable, non-threatening
- Educational and professional
- Technology feels helpful, not overwhelming
- Diverse and inclusive representation

CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS:
- AI character must be friendly teal robot with helpful expression
- Student must appear engaged and learning
- Context (Water Skiing) should be subtly integrated
- Maintain warm, encouraging atmosphere
- Professional educational quality
